item.title: Hi Tony. I'm the author...I was trawling through b...
item.description:
Hi Tony. I'm the author...I was trawling through blog hits on 'Last Light' and found your post.

First of all, thanks for name-checking the book, I'm glad you enjoyed it. I'd dearly love to think market-forces will dive in and bail us out at the eleventh hour, and they â€¦
item.dc:creator: alex
